## TableStyleSpecs interface

An object describing how to generate styles. See [cssRulesFromSpecs()](./react-native-render-html-table-bridge.cssrulesfromspecs.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TableStyleSpecs 
```
